install.name: Stop Copy Module
install.function: Disables mouse highlight and right click functions
install.author: www.dstechcafe.com
install.description:
Instructions:
1. Activate the module 2. Go to Module Manager, Disable Show Title 3. Set Position to "highest position possible for your theme".(Usually Banner1 or User1) Disclaimer: Disabling Right Click Fucntion is 100% smooth. However, disable highlight cursor works ok with IE. It may become buggy via simultaneuos cursor highlighting on Firefox resulting to function highlight stopper to fail
